column4: I'm having issues running subversion, ever since I ran some updates (to python I think)

when I ran svn commit, it actually called python 'interactive interpreter', and then  failed to commit with a message "svn: Can't create directory '/var/local/svn/db/transactions/4874-1.txn': Permission denied". Any ideas?
Do you really need to run sudo just push a commit ? That seems unintelligent.
